description: An Agentic KG for Education and Personalized Learning designed to generate, adapt, and optimize educational content and assessments based on individual student performance. This KG dynamically produces personalized lessons, interactive assessments, and adaptive feedback, while integrating blockchain‑audited licensing and decentralized governance to ensure transparent, monetizable, and continuously improving learning outcomes.

trainingExamples.input: Generate a personalized algebra lesson for a student struggling with quadratic equations.
trainingExamples.expectedOutput: A detailed lesson plan with examples, exercises, and adaptive assessments tailored to the student's needs.
trainingExamples.description: Training example for personalized lesson generation.

trainingExamples.input: Design a science quiz based on updated curriculum topics.
trainingExamples.expectedOutput: A quiz with questions that reflect current curriculum standards and accurately assess student understanding.

evaluationExamples.input: Evaluate the effectiveness of a personalized lesson plan for improving student test scores in geometry.
evaluationExamples.expectedOutput: A report comparing pre- and post-lesson assessment scores, with recommendations for further adaptation.

finalExamExamples.input: Design an adaptive learning module for a high school history curriculum that adjusts content based on student feedback.
finalExamExamples.expectedOutput: A comprehensive learning module with interactive lessons, adaptive assessments, and feedback loops that personalize the educational experience.
finalExamExamples.description: Final exam: comprehensive personalized learning module.

agents.name: BaseLearningAgent
agents.description: Extracts baseline educational content and student performance data for further analysis.

agents.name: ContentGenerationAgent
agents.description: Dynamically generates personalized educational content and lesson plans based on curriculum standards and student needs.

agents.name: AssessmentAgent
agents.description: Designs adaptive assessments and quizzes that dynamically adjust to individual student performance.

agents.name: FeedbackAnalysisAgent
agents.description: Analyzes student feedback and performance data to refine and adapt educational content in real time.

agents.name: DynamicCompositeLearningAgent
agents.description: Dynamically combines outputs from multiple educational agents to produce a comprehensive, personalized learning module.

metadata.notes: This Personalized Learning KG dynamically generates tailored educational content, assessments, and feedback for individual learners. Blockchain‑audited licensing and decentralized governance ensure transparent monetization and continuous content refinement based on student performance data.

pricing.dynamicPricing: Based on content complexity and student engagement
